ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] URL Canonicalization Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Igor, but have a look at this document. http://dblab.ssu.ac.kr/publication/LeKi05a.pdf They seem to have done fair bit of experiments with this issue.
